Load_On_Read_only: Load data on read only transaction?
Install_Confirmation_Dialog_Content: Are you sure you want to install?
Install_Description: This module sends a request to get online data upon entering the transaction.
Opm_Details_Description_section_1: The following web service will be called upon entering and re-entering the transaction.
Opm_Details_Description_section_2: The result will be saved in a temporary transaction header field.
